# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for sale. This item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. Considering its worth to me and its potential value to you, I propose selling it to you for $95. This price allows me to recoup some of my investment while also providing you with an opportunity to acquire something valuable at a reasonable cost. I trust that you'll find the product to be worth every penny. Looking forward to your response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
